title: The vvits paraphras'd, or, Paraphrase upon paraphrase in a burlesque on the several late translations of Ovids Epistles.
author: Stevenson, Matthew, fl. 1654-1685.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"The epistle dedicatory" is addressed to Mr. Julian, signed: M.T.
This parody is especially aimed at Dryden's translation of Ovid's Epistles.
